pages.text: The Sawmill is a machine that cuts logs into planks more efficiently than crafting. It produces $(l:thermal:world/plants/tree_products)Sawdust$(/l) as a byproduct.

$(li)$(l:thermal:technology/augments/rf_coil)Expanded RF Coil$(/l)$(li)$(l:thermal:technology/augments/rf_coil_storage)Stabilized RF Coil$(/l)$(li)$(l:thermal:technology/augments/rf_coil_xfer)High-Flux RF Coil$(/l)$(li)$(l:thermal:technology/augments/machine_speed)Flux Linkage Amplifier$(/l)$(li)$(l:thermal:technology/augments/machine_output)Auxiliary Process Sieve$(/l)
